API/API_region_classification.py¶

Author: Norland Raphael Hagen <norlandrhagen@gmail.com> Date: 07-23-2021

cmapdata - region_classification - region classification functionallity.

ingest.region_classification.classified_gdf_to_list(classified_gdf)¶

Takes a classified/joined geodataframe and returns a set of ocean regions

Parameters

classified_gdf (geopandas geodataframe) – The joined geodataframe that contains points as well as regions.

Returns

A unique list of regions belonging to that dataset.

Return type

region_set

ingest.region_classification.classify_gdf_with_gpkg_regions(data_gdf, region_gdf)¶

Takes sparse data geodataframe and classifies it to an ocean region

Parameters

  • data_gdf (geopandas geodataframe) – A geodataframe created from the input CMAP dataframe.

  • region_gdf (geopandas geodataframe) – A geodataframe created from ocean region gpkg.

ingest.region_classification.geopandas_load_gpkg(input_df)¶
Parameters

input_df (Pandas DataFrame) – CMAP formatted DataFrame

Returns

Geopandas formatted DataFrame. ie. geometry column.

Return type

gdf (Geopandas GeoDataFrame)

ingest.region_classification.if_exists_dataset_region(dataset_name, server)¶

Checks if dataset ID is already in tblDatasets_Regions

Parameters

  • dataset_name (string) – The short name of the dataset in CMAP tblDatasets.

  • server (string) – Valid CMAP server name : ex. rainier

Returns: Boolean

ingest.region_classification.insert_into_tblCruise_Regions(region_set, server)¶

Inserts region set into tblCruise_Regions

Parameters

  • region_set (set) – set of region_ID’s from tblRegions

  • server (str) – Valid CMAP server name. ex Rainier

ingest.region_classification.insert_into_tblDataset_Regions(region_set, dataset_name, server)¶

Inserts region set into tblDataset_Regions

Parameters

  • region_set (set) – set of region_ID’s from tblRegions

  • dataset_name (str) – valid dataset name in CMAP

  • server (str) – Valid CMAP server name. ex Rainier

ingest.region_classification.load_gpkg_ocean_region(input_gpkg_fpath)¶

Uses Geopandas to load input geopackage (gpkg)

Parameters

input_gpkg_fpath (Geopackage - .gpkg) – Input Geopackage containing geometries used for ocean region classifcation.

Returns

Outputs geodataframe of ocean region geometries.

Return type

gpkg_region (GeoDataFrame)

ingest.region_classification.ocean_region_classification(data_df)¶

This function geographically classifes a sparse dataset into a specific ocean region

Parameters

df (Pandas DataFrame) – Input CMAP formatted DataFrame (ST Index: time,lat,lon,<depth>)
